title: Ellie Kemper reveals she gave birth last month, shares name (and first photo!) of baby no. 2
text:
CLOSE

Ellie Kemper attends the "Unbreakable Kimmy Schmidt" for your consideration event. (Photo: ANGELA WEISS, AFP/Getty Images)

Surprise! Ellie Kemper's second child is already here.

The actress took to Instagram Saturday to share that baby no. 2 was born last month.

"Happy 1-Month Birthday to our baby boy, Matthew!" she wrote with heart emojis. "He has inherited his dad’s brown hair and his mom’s desire to be carried around all day in a baby sling. He’s a good boy."

Kemper also shares son James, 3, with comedian husband Michael Koman.

In the photo, we see a smiling, makeup-free Kemper holding her newborn in a baby sling. We also get a little glimpse of baby Matthew himself! Well, the back of his head at least.

Kemper's followers took to the comment section to congratulate the new momma.

Busy Phillips sent multiple heart emojis along with a message.

"Ellie! Congratulations!!!! His head is beautiful and you look stunning!!!" she wrote.

Mandy Moore wrote, "Congrats!!!!"

And Hilaria Baldwin shared a simple heart emoji.

'Kelly and Ryan' never looked cuter!: Photographer stages spot-on set shoot with baby hosts

description: Actress Ellie Kemper took to Instagram Saturday to share that baby no. 2, a boy named Matthew, was born last month.
